mapper.select:
select zj.*,yt.name as yt_name from pro_zujin as zj LEFT JOIN pro_zujin_yt as yt on zj.company_type_id=yt.id
and isnull(zj.brand,'') like '%'+#{searchBrand}+'%'

select SUM(ys_money) as 'ysMoney', SUM(sj_money) as 'sjMoney', SUM(cw_money) as 'cwMoney', SUM(kp_money) as 'kpMoney', SUM(year_rental) as 'yearRental', SUM(bzj_money) as 'bzjMoney', SUM(return_money) as 'returnMoney' from pro_zujin

select SUM(ys_money) as 'ysMoney', SUM(sj_money) as 'sjMoney', SUM(cw_money) as 'cwMoney', SUM(kp_money) as 'kpMoney', SUM(year_rental) as 'yearRental', SUM(bzj_money) as 'bzjMoney', SUM(return_money) as 'returnMoney' from pro_zujin where is_sh=#{type} and date_time LIKE #{year}+'%'

select (SUM(moneys.proMoney) - SUM(zj.cw_money)) from pro_zujin as zj LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(pro_money) as 'proMoney' , pro_detail_id FROM pro_detail_c where pro_date <= #{endDatetime} group by pro_detail_id) as moneys on cast(zj.id as varchar(50))=pro_detail_id where moneys.proMoney > zj.cw_money

select (SUM(moneys.proMoney) - SUM(zj.cw_money)) from pro_zujin as zj LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(pro_money) as 'proMoney' , pro_detail_id FROM pro_detail_c where pro_date <= #{endDatetime} group by pro_detail_id) as moneys on zj.id=pro_detail_id where moneys.proMoney > zj.cw_money

select COUNT(zj.id) from pro_zujin as zj
LEFT JOIN pro_zujin_house_r as r on zj.id=r.zj_id left join pro_zujin_house pzh on r.house_id=pzh.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(pro_money) as 'proMoney' , pro_detail_id FROM pro_detail_c where pro_date <= #{endDatetime} group by pro_detail_id) as moneys on zj.id=pro_detail_id
and moneys.proMoney > zj.cw_money
and end_datetime >= #{endDatetime}
and end_datetime <= #{endDatetime}
and end_datetime between #{startDateTime} and #{endDatetime}
and ys_money > cw_money
and isNull(series,'')+isNull(company,'')+isNull(brand,'')+isNull(convert(varchar(20),zj.acreage),'')+isNull(zl_person,'')+ isNull(zl_person_tel,'')+isNull(staff_name,'')+isNull(convert(varchar(20),ys_money),'')+isNull(convert(varchar(20),sj_money),'')+isNull(convert(varchar(20),kp_money),'')+ isNull(zj.remark,'')+isNull(pzh.pw_number,'') LIKE '%'+#{searchText}+'%'
and isNull(bzj_money,0) > 0 and isNull(bzj_money,0) > abs(isNull(return_money,0))
and zl_type in (${zlType})
mapper.insert: insert into pro_zujin(series, company, brand, pay_type, zl_type, acreage, zl_person, zl_person_tel, company_type_id, staff_name, is_dz, is_sh, ys_money, sj_money, kp_money, cw_money, remark, staff_id, date_time, last_staff_id, last_date_time,dz_number,year_rental,end_datetime,bzj_money,type,start_datetime,files) values (#{series}, #{company}, #{brand}, #{payType}, #{zlType}, #{acreage}, #{zlPerson}, #{zlPersonTel}, #{companyTypeId}, #{staffName}, #{isDz}, #{isSh}, #{ysMoney}, #{sjMoney}, #{kpMoney}, #{cwMoney}, #{remark}, #{staffId}, #{dateTime}, #{lastStaffId}, #{lastDateTime},#{dzNumber},#{yearRental},#{endDatetime},#{bzjMoney},#{type},#{startDatetime},#{files})
mapper.update:
update pro_zujin
ys_money = #{ysMoney},
sj_money = #{sjMoney},
kp_money = #{kpMoney},
cw_money = #{cwMoney},
last_staff_id = #{lastStaffId},
last_date_time = #{lastDateTime},
year_rental = #{yearRental},
where id = #{id}

update pro_zujin
bzj_money = #{bzjMoney},
bzj_type = #{bzjType},
return_money = #{returnBzjMoney},
where id = #{id}

update pro_zujin
series = #{series},
company = #{company},
brand = #{brand},
pay_type = #{payType},
zl_type = #{zlType},
acreage = #{acreage},
zl_person = #{zlPerson},
zl_person_tel = #{zlPersonTel},
company_type_id = #{companyTypeId},
staff_name = #{staffName},
is_dz = #{isDz},
is_sh = #{isSh},
ys_money = #{ysMoney},
sj_money = #{sjMoney},
kp_money = #{kpMoney},
cw_money = #{cwMoney},
remark = #{remark},
last_staff_id = #{lastStaffId},
last_date_time = #{lastDateTime},
dz_number = #{dzNumber},
year_rental = #{yearRental},
end_datetime = #{endDatetime},
start_datetime = #{startDatetime},
files = #{files},
type = #{type},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from pro_zujin where type != 9 and end_datetime <= #{endDate}
mapper.update: update pro_zujin set type=#{type} where id=#{id}
